mapper.insert: INSERT INTO categories (name, description, parent_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{parent.id}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.parent_id, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM categories c ORDER BY c.id ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.parent_id, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM categories c WHERE c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.id ASC
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.parent_id, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM categories c WHERE c.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE categories SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
